song_name: You Are Not Alone - Single Version
lyrics:
6 contributorsyou are not alone single version lyricsverse 1
another day has gone im still all alone
how could this be youre not here with me
you never said goodbye someone tell me why
did you have to go and leave my world so cold

prechorus
every day i sit and ask myself how did love slip away
something whispers in my ear and says

chorus
that you are not alone i am here with you
though youre far away i am here to stay
but you are not alone i am here with you
though were far apart youre always in my heart
but you are not alone

postchorus
lone lone why
lone

verse 2
just the other night i thought i heard you cry
asking me to come and hold you in my arms
i can hear your prayers your burdens i will bear
but first i need your hand then forever can begin
